entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
